content: Received via e-mail. Starting today, (May 1, 2009) veterans can apply online to receive education benefits under the Post-9/11 GI Bill. Apply now: http://www.gibill.va.gov/ The new education benefits package is the most comprehensive since the original GI Bill for World War II veterans. Help us spread the word about the application process by forwarding this email to your networks of veterans and military families. So many of you fought hard for this new GI Bill to be signed into law. Now it's our job to make sure every veteran knows about these new benefits. Thanks for your continued help and support in this fight!

title: New GI Bill Education benefits now available.
